name: Food Fight (itch) (GryffnGaming)
description:
This is my very first game, had to restart 3 times due to bad backup habits, now I back up every couple of hours! So this is 5 days of work, I didn't get to make more custom models so both NPCs/Mobs and terrain will be replaced soon as I plan to keep this server online.

If low fps there are extensive graphic selections in the Esc/settings/graphic menu.

**Wiki page for loot tables, mob info and location www.sadmagicstudio.com

 This is the story of a calm peaceful meat-loving region being invaded by disgusting broccoli! Create your delicious steak character and fight the evil vegetables! Or if you are a fan of the abomination known as broccoli you can play as one and tip the scales of the never-ending Food Fight!

Controls are WASD to move, spacebar to jump.

Hold left mouse button down to move around without your camera moving. 

Hold right-click to pan view around, scroll wheel to zoom in/out.

Double right-click to interact with most things, mobs/npcs.

Thanks for  playing :)
